name: Dogfight Simulator Tribute
description:
Controls:

Left: Rotate counterclockwise

Right: Rotate clockwise

Up: Engine start, fire

Game controllers also usable (L1/2, R1/2, A/B/X/O).

Tips:

If Your plane stalled, turn it towards the ground, and if the altitude was enough, the engine will start again.

Adjust the acceleration coefficient carefully in the Options menu. The planes may take off around six tenths of their runway.
